## MatcherDslDeclaration type

Defines the DSL for a matcher.

Note that more than one Matcher DSL can point to the same matcher implementation - that is, you might have multiple DSL objects with the same type.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MatcherDslDeclaration = DslObjectDeclaration & {
    readonly constantParams?: Record<string, string> & {
        readonly resolvesTo?: Extract<ParameterType, 'string' | 'boolean' | 'number' | 'integer' | 'null'>;
    };
    readonly contextModifiers?: Record<string, string>;
    readonly currentRunModifiers?: Record<string, string>;
};
```
**References:** [DslObjectDeclaration](./case-plugin-base.dslobjectdeclaration.md)<!-- -->, [ParameterType](./case-plugin-base.parametertype.md)
